work.title: Stellar Cookware • eCommerce
work.introHeading: Cooking up more traffic & revenue for Stellar Cookware
work.para: 10Techies's SEO, Content and Paid Media teams used their skills and expertise to improve the revenue, organic visibility and traffic for Stellar Cookware, one of the UK's leading kitchenware brands.

work.title: EventStoreDB • Lead Gen
work.introHeading: LinkedIn Ads drive quality conversions for niche SaaS company
work.para: 10Techies worked with Event Store, the company behind EventStoreDB - an open-source state-transition database for building event-sourced software applications, to boost lead generation, registrations and sign-ups through targeted marketing on LinkedIn.

percent.text: increase in clicks year on year
